publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-932# Colin Fox: Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp-That the Parliament welcomes the US Postal Service's decision to issue a stamp in commemoration of the life of the singer, athlete and political activist Paul Robeson and believes that this is a fitting tribute to a man who made an enormous contribution to the cultural life of the United States of America and Britain throughout the 1930s, 1940s and 1950s and yet paid a heavy price as a victim of the McCarthyite witch-hunt that was rife in the USA in the 1950s. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-932# Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp (lodged on 23 February 2004) Mark Ballard*, Bill Butler*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-932# Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp (lodged on 23 February 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-932# Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp (lodged on 23 February 2004) Marlyn Glen*

S2M-932# Colin Fox: Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp-That the Parliament welcomes the US Postal Service's decision to issue a stamp in commemoration of the life of the singer, athlete and political activist Paul Robeson and believes that this is a fitting tribute to a man who made an enormous contribution to the cultural life of the United States of America and Britain throughout the 1930s, 1940s and 1950s and yet paid a heavy price as a victim of the McCarthyite witch-hunt that was rife in the USA in the 1950s. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Rosie Kane, Mark Ballard, Bill Butler, Christine Grahame, Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Marlyn Glen
S2M-932# Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp (lodged on 23 February 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Trish Godman*
S2M-932# Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp (lodged on 23 February 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-932# Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp (lodged on 23 February 2004) Helen Eadie*, Scott Barrie*
S2M-932# Paul Robeson US Commemorative Stamp (lodged on 23 February 2004) Linda Fabiani*
